===Verb===

# to [[chew]]; to [[masticate]]
# to [[think over]]; to [[mull over]]; to [[ponder]]; to [[ruminate]]

[[zh:咬嚼]]

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|for both "chew" and "think over" senses}} {{zh-l|咀嚼}}

====Usage notes====
In the term {{zh-l|咬嚼|tr=yǎojué}}, the character {{zh-l|嚼}} is pronounced jué, however when used as a character by itself (meaning "to chew"), {{zh-l|嚼}} is pronounced jiáo.
